## Example: colData

```{r}
#| echo: true
# Load mia R package
library(mia)

# Load example data 
data(HintikkaXOData)
mae <- HintikkaXOData
tse <- mae[["microbiota"]]

# Check column data for this data object
colData(tse)
```

## Example: rowData

```{r}
#| echo: true
# Check column data for this data object
rowData(tse)
```
